response.overview: Raqs Media Collective presents an essay film with animated and collaged elements that unravel at different time spans. The three members of Raqs Media Collective dived into the Kolb-Proust archive at the University of Champaign Urbana to write new words – of emergencies, thwarted frustrations and disorder – in Marcel Proust’s handwriting, seen through prismatic light.
response.title: When Proust Catches The Glare

results.name: Prototype 34: When Proust Catches the Glare by Raqs Media Collective
